description: Main game menu screen shown after user authentication. Provides navigation to Continue Career, New Career, Load Career, Settings, and Credits.
goal: Create the post-login landing page that serves as the main hub for career mode navigation
requirements: Continue Career button (primary) showing current game state (week, opponent)
New Career button to start fresh career mode
Load Career button to access saved careers
Consistent styling with auth screens (dark theme, blue accents)
constraints: Must follow existing design system from auth-ui
UI only - no backend logic for career management yet
